reviews.review_msg: Mike is honestly a nice person but just shouldn't teach. For most of the semester, we would have in-person lecture where we watched his old recorded zoom lectures individually and the lectures weren't great. He didn't care to make sure that the class understood the material, especially after the class got a 50% average on the lab midterms.

Absolutely awful professor. This is the worst teacher I've ever had at SFU, he is lazy and reuses lecture material. He doesn't help, he is quick to give you a 5-word answer during office hours and dismiss you as soon as possible. Lecture quizzes were next to impossible to do well in because of the time restraint. Final exam avg was 50%.
